name: Systemic
description:
Since its founding in 1994, SYSTEMIC has anticipated the needs of its customers and is partnering with EMC, now the world's largest vendor of storage drives, to provide the largest companies with technological and financial solutions on the market. Today, SYSTEMIC is one of the first integrators of EMC in France and 3rd European integrator.
With the recent acquisition of DATASAVE, SSII specialized in back-up and backup, SYSTEMIC further strengthens its skills and position as the leading independent actor dedicated to storage in France.
